# mw_is_function

**Source:** `src/public_html/res/js/main.js`

---

## Description

Returns true when the provided value is a JavaScript function. The helper is defensive: it returns false for falsy values.

## Signature

function mw_is_function(data)

- data: any â€” value to test

## Returns

- boolean

## Example

mw_is_function(function(){}) // -> true
mw_is_function(null) // -> false
